public class Zombie
extends ZombieActor
A Zombie. This Zombie is pretty boring. It needs to be made more interesting.
Author:
ram, Chantelle Loh, Gan

  • Method Details

    • getIntrinsicWeapon

      public ZombieIntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
      Method that returns a ZombieIntrinsicWeapon. Before returning the IntrinsicWeapon, if punch is chosen to be returned (random process), then the probability of punch ZombieIntrinsicWeapon will be adjusted according to the number of arms the Zombie still has, according to the formula (number of arms left/maximum number of legs) multiply original probability.
      Returns:
      a ZombieIntrinsicWeapon object

    • hurt

      public void hurt​(int points, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      When the Zombie is hurt, its hitpoints will be reduced. Then, there is a 25% chance that its limb will be knocked off, handled by knockOffLimb method.
      Parameters:
      points - number of hitpoints to deduct
      map - The map that the Zombie is in
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if Hurt points is negative
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if points parameter is a null
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if map parameter is a null

    • getWeapon

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon getWeapon​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      Overloading method for getWeapon. If the weapon gotten is an isntance of WeaponItem, then there is a chance that this weapon will be dropped. The probability of dropping the weapon that the Zombie is currently holding depends on the number of arms the Zombie still has. If no arm left, probability of dropping will be 1. Only one arm left, probability of dropping will be 0.5. Two arm left, probability of dropping will be 0. A DropItemAction class will be created when the Zombie drops its weapon and then be executed. Null will be returned. If weapon gotten is not an instance of WeaponItem, then just return the weapon gotten.
      Parameters:
      map - The map Zombie is in
      Returns:
      Weapon gotten, null if the Zombie drops the weapon. 0
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if map parameter is a null

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
      If a Zombie can attack, it will. Then, if the Zombie is movable (at least one leg left) it will chase any human within 10 spaces or wander if there is no Human is around. However, if the Zombie cannot attack and cannot move, then it will do nothing. There is 10% chance, Zombie will say Braiinss every turn If there is a weapon at Zombie's location, unarmed Zombie will pick it up
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - list of possible Actions
      lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
      map - the map where the current Zombie is
      display - the Display where the Zombie's utterances will be displayed
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if map parameter is a null
